body: Let me add that I've been using the code that Minux pointed me to (a long time ago) with some minor modifications and it is working for me.  If his code was put into golang.org/x/arch/ppc64 after changing the strings from power64 to ppc64, then there are just a few other minor changes to get objump and the testcase to work on ppc64x and I can finish those if necessary.  For now if it could be put into golang.org/x/arch (not sure if that is frozen too?) that would make it easier to use and the rest could be done later for Go 1.8.
